dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and use logical reasoning to find solutions.
Your FarTwin will think outside the box and explore unconventional approaches to solve problems.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to learn new information?

options.description: Your FarTwin is a visual learner, using images and diagrams to understand complex concepts.
Your FarTwin is an auditory learner, preferring to listen and repeat information to understand it.

dimensions.label: Work Environment Preference
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin prefer to work?

options.description: Your FarTwin prefers to work independently, with minimal supervision and freedom to make decisions.
Your FarTwin thrives in a collaborative environment, working closely with others to achieve shared goals.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Sense of Humor
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin typically respond to humor?

options.description: Your FarTwin has a dry sense of humor, often responding with sarcasm or irony.
Your FarTwin has a playful and lighthearted sense of humor, often laughing at things that others might find funny.

dimensions.label: Relationship Style
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach relationships?

options.description: Your FarTwin values deep, intimate connections with others, prioritizing emotional vulnerability and trust.
Your FarTwin prefers to maintain casual, low-key relationships, avoiding intense emotional commitments.

dimensions.label: Creative Expression
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin express their creativity?

options.description: Your FarTwin expresses themselves through visual art, such as painting or drawing.
Your FarTwin expresses themselves through music, often playing an instrument or singing.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How does your FarTwin approach risk?

options.description: Your FarTwin seeks out thrilling experiences and takes calculated risks to push their boundaries.
Your FarTwin prefers to err on the side of caution, avoiding unnecessary risks and taking a more conservative approach.
